languages.text: {n}Гигант задумчиво и долго смотрит на вас, а затем изрекает:{/n} "Ты даже не знаешь, о чем говоришь, смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Когда-нибудь я расскажу тебе про одиночество. Когда мы выберемся отсюда".
{n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."
languages.original_text: {n}Гигант задумчиво и долго смотрит на вас, а затем изрекает:{/n} "Ты даже не знаешь, о чем говоришь, смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Когда-нибудь я расскажу тебе про одиночество. Когда мы выберемся отсюда".

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You don't even know of what you speak, mortal. I will tell you of loneliness sometime. After we're out of here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Il vous adresse un long regard pensif, avant de répondre :{/n} « Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce dont vous parlez, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Je vous raconterai un jour ce qu'est la véritable solitude. Quand on sera sortis d'ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il adresse un long regard pensif, avant de vous répondre :{/n}« Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce dont vous parlez, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Je vous raconterai un jour ce qu'est la véritable solitude. Quand on sera sortis d'ici. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}他深思般地看了你很久，随后开了口。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说些什么，凡人。我可以告诉你孤独是什么样的感觉，等咱们离开这个地方之后。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}他深思般地看了你很久，随后开了口。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说些什么，凡人。以后有空的话，我可以告诉你孤独是什么样的感觉，等咱们离开这个地方之后。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は物思いに沈んだような視線をあなたにじっと向け、こう言った。{/n}「お前が自分が何を話しているのかさえ、よく分かっていないようだな、人間よ。いつか孤独について教えてやろう。ここを出た後でな」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は物思いに沈んだような視線をあなたにじっと向け、こう言った。{/n}「お前が自分が何を話しているのかさえ、よく分かっていないようだな、人間よ。いつか孤独について教えてやろう。ここを出た後でな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Er sieht dich lange nachdenklich an, bevor er sagt:{/n} "Ihr habt keine Vorstellung, wovon Ihr sprecht, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Irgendwann erzähle ich Euch, wie es ist, allein zu sein. Sobald wir hier raus sind."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt dich lange nachdenklich an, bevor er sagt:{/n} "Ihr habt keine Vorstellung, wovon Ihr sprecht, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Irgendwann werde ich versuchen Euch zu erklären, was Einsamkeit bedeutet. Nachdem wir hier raus sind."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Te dedica una mirada larga y pensativa antes de responder.{/n} «Ni siquiera sabes de qué estás hablando, mortal. Algún día te hablaré yo de lo que es la estar solo. Cuando salgamos de aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te dedica una mirada larga y pensativa antes de responder.{/n} «Ni siquiera sabes de qué estás hablando, mortal. Algún día te hablaré yo de lo que es la soledad. Cuando estemos fuera de aquí».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sana uzun uzun, düşüncelere dalarak baktıktan sonra konuşuyor.{/n} "Ağzından çıkan lafın anlamından bihabersin fâni. Bir gün sana yalnızlık neymiş anlatayım. Hele buradan çıkalım da."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long, pensive look before he says,{/n} "You do not even know what it is you speak of, mortal. I will tell you about being alone sometime. Once we are out of here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana uzun uzun, düşüncelere dalarak baktıktan sonra konuşuyor.{/n} "Ağzından çıkan lafın anlamından bihabersin fâni. Bir gün sana yalnızlık neymiş anlatayım. Hele buradan çıkalım da."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
